inertia.name: Agar Art
inertia.desc: Everyone knows how colorful the world of microbes is. Why not represent it in a beautiful way? Bring out your inner artist by using streaking, preading and pouring to make a colorful creation on Agar using microbes.

inertia.name: Virtual Stock Market
inertia.desc: Explore a new world of stock market, deduce the effect of news, buy and sell virtual stocks on the stock market along with share prices in a risk-free environment.

inertia.name: Chem E-Jeopardy
inertia.desc: You think you know chemistry? Take this fun quiz and show how much it takes to sort the jeopardy that is indeed chemical engineering.
